title: Time Series Analysis - 2 | Time Series in R | ARIMA Model Forecasting | Data Science | Simplilearn
excerpt: This Time Series Analysis (Part-2) in R tutorial will help you understand what is ARIMA model, what is correlation & auto-correlation and you will alose see a use case implementation in which we forecast sales of air-tickets using ARIMA and at the end, we will also how to validate a model using Ljung-Box
